item.title: KONOSUBA – God’s Blessing on this Wonderful World! Prosperity for this Beloved City! announced for PC, iOS, and Android
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • Smartphone

Due out in 2026 in Japan.

Kadokawa Corporation has announced KONOSUBA – God’s Blessing on this Wonderful World! Prosperity for this Beloved City!, a new game based on the TV anime series with an original story. It will launch for PC, iOS, and Android in 2026 in Japan.

Here are a couple of creator comments:

Natsume Akatsuki – Creator

“Congratulations and thank you for the new KONOSUBA game! I’d like to aim to be an independent solo player like Yunyun, so I hope the event design won’t exclude those who play alone. I’m really looking forward to starting the game!”

Kurone Mishima – Illustrator

“Congratulations on the new KONOSUBA game! I’m truly happy to be able to meet Kazuma and the others again in this form. I hope many people will enjoy playing it! I’ll be playing as well once the game is released!”

Visit the official website here. Follow the game on Twitter here.



https://www.gematsu.com/2026/01/konosuba-gods-blessing-on-this-wonderful-world-prosperity-for-this-beloved-city-announced-for-pc-ios-and-android
item.dc:creator: invalid@example.com (ResetEra_Newsbot

item.title: Inazuma Eleven: Victory Road second free major update titled ‘Ares & Fabled Seed DLC’
item.content:encoded:
The second free major update for Inazuma Eleven: Victory Road is titled “Ares & Fabled Seed DLC,” developer LEVEL-5 announced. As announced yesterday, it will launch on January 28.

The update will introduce new features, including the opening of the Ares Route in Chronicle Mode, where players can “enjoy a blazing football drama about boys and girls striving for the very top.”

LEVEL-5 will also distribute a special item, “Fabled Seed,” which allows every player to upgrade one character of their choice to Fabled—the rarity introduced in the first free major update.

Inazuma Eleven: Victory Road is available now for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch 2, PlayStation 4, Switch, and PC via Steam.



https://www.gematsu.com/2026/01/inazuma-eleven-victory-road-second-free-major-update-titled-ares-fabled-seed-dlc
